ComicInfo.Title: Queen of Hearts
ComicInfo.Summary:
The hunt for the Ace of Spades continues as Calie and Violet head to the beaches of south Florida to face the Queen of Hearts. Though the Queen is surrounded by dedicated servants, something is awry in the kingdom of sun and sand. Will Calie and Violet's arrival spell the end of the Ace's armies, or is this another piece of his elaborate scheme to rule over Wonderland?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Roger Bonet & Beezzz Studio | 1 | B | Cover B | Noah Salonga & Jorge Cortes | 4 | C | Cover C | Martin Able | 5 | D | 4th of July Exclusive Cover, Limited to 200 | Michael Dooney & Ula Mos | Missing | E | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive 4th of July Variant Cover, Limited to 200 | Michael Dooney & Ula Mos | 2 | F | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Cosplay Variant Cover, Limited to 25 | Paul Green & Ula Mos | 3 |
